nodes.text: Andoan White was an alcoholic beverage available in Oga's Cantina in Black Spire Outpost on the planet Batuu. It was imported from the homeworld of the Aqualish species, Ando. During the Clone Wars, the cantina's bartender Janott listed the drink among those available to the human Senator Padmé Amidala when she visited the cantina, and she ordered it. The drink was still available in 34 ABY. In his guidebook Traveler's Guide to Batuu, Eloc Throno described Andoan White as a light, refreshing, crisp, and balanced white wine.

Andoan White first appeared in the 2018 novel Thrawn: Alliances, which was written by Timothy Zahn. Prior to the 2019 opening of the theme park Star Wars: Galaxy's Edge, the drink was reported to be coming to the out-of-universe Oga's Cantina bar, but the drink did not appear on the menu after the park opened.
